betterquesting:10.desc:8:
the §6Chemical Injection Chamber§r allows you to §einject chemicals (§7gas§e) into items to react them together§r, often used to §ebreak down ores or crystals into shards§r. This is a crucial machine in the Tier 3 Ore Processing line.

This machine has a factory variant, which allows you to react with multiple items at once; allowing great efficiently while using up more energy.

To craft one, you'll need four §6Reinforced Alloy§rs, two §6Elite Control Circuit§rs, two §6Gold Ingot§rs, and a §6Purification Chamber§r.
